items.title: The Secret Geopolitics Of The Netflix Christmas Movie Universe
items.description: Behind Netflix's cocoa-sipping rom-com frippery must lie the hard Thucydidean realities of diplomacy and war.

items.title: How Trump And The Republicans Became The Party Of George Bailey
items.description: In the unlikely persona of Donald Trump, the American 'rabble' have found an unlikely hero who stands up on their behalf to remind the 'warped, frustr...

items.title: Shunning Friends And Family For Their Political Beliefs Is An Affront To The Spirit Of Christmas
items.description: As we celebrate Christmas, all of us, regardless of our political persuasion, should strive to live out Jesus’ words in Matthew 5:43-44.

items.title: ‘Home Alone’ Hilariously Teaches Timeless Truths About Motherhood
items.description: 'Home Alone' isn’t just a funny Christmas movie. It displays a mother’s transformation from selfish, absentee parent to devoted loving mother.

items.title: The Most Politically Absurd Things Americans Had To Endure This Year
items.description: If this presidential election year taught us anything, it’s that there is no bottom in matters of the politically absurd.
